Subjects: Adrian, saint, life of; saints’ lives
_description: Life of St. Adrian in the Scottish Legendary — in couplets

CULGg26.First Lines:
[Þ]e tyme þat maximianeþe stat of þe empyre had
                    tane…
CULGg26.Last Lines:
…owt of þis lyf þat we ma twenebut schame ded &
                    deidly syne
CULGg26.Note:
